scripts.build-to-tutoron: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../tutoron/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../tutoron/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/'
scripts.build-to-pwa: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../pwa/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../pwa/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/'
scripts.build-to-tabix: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../tabixio/tabix/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../tabixio/tabix/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/'
scripts.build-to-react-components: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../@vzh-react-components/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../@vzh-react-components/node_modules/@vzh/mobx-stores/'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.patch-publish: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-publish: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-publish: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
